# Morse

```{r}
morse <- read.csv(file = 'Data_csv/Morse_code.csv')
morse <- as.matrix(morse)
rownames(morse) <- colnames(morse)
```
```{r}
D <- diag(1 / sqrt(diag(morse))) %*%
  morse %*%
  diag(1 / sqrt(diag(morse)))
D <- (D + t(D)) / 2
D <- 1 - D
```
```{r}
mds <- cmdscale(d = D, k = 2, eig = T)
plot(1:36, mds$eig)
abline(h = 0)
```
